page.title: 20OUR LOCALITY
page.content: We looked at the areas around us. A generation ago the land was farm land,open spaces and wooded areas. Today much of the land is covered by large, modern housing estates and many of the land marks have disappeared. Many of the local estates have taken their names from the farms they are built upon.We wondered why these estates have mushroomed during the last generation, so we decided to find out when the families in our class came to Cwmbran.The families fell into 2 groups ,families who have been here for more than 3 generations + families who came to live here in the last few years.Both parents born in Cwmbran 5, one parent born in Cwmbran 4,neither parent born locally 19.1/4 of those surveyed have moved to Cwmbran in last 9 years.This suggests Cwmbran is still an expanding New Town. CLASS.2
